LanguageData.TimesOnFire.description: Скільки часу я був під ворожим вогнем.

LanguageData.OperationsReceived.label: операцій зроблено

LanguageData.TimesTendedTo.description: How many times I have had my medical conditions tended.

LanguageData.TimesTendedOther.description: How many times I have tended to others' medical conditions.
